title: Discover
logInToResolve: Log in to resolve remote accounts by handle or URL.
noAccountFoundForHandle: No account found for this handle or URL.
checkHandleAndTryAgain: Check the handle or URL and try again.
followFilterFollowing: You're not following anyone matching this filter yet.
followFilterNotFollowing: You're following everyone matching this filter.
pasteRemoteHandle: Paste a remote handle (e.g. @user@domain) or URL in the search bar to find accounts.
noLocalMatch: No local accounts match your search.
pasteRemoteOrTryDifferent: Paste a remote handle or URL in the search bar, or try a different search.
description: Find and follow accounts from this server or from other federated servers (Mobilizon, Gancio, etc.).
